promos.title: 15% OFF with Self Pick-Up
promos.description: Enjoy 15% off all-day on your order via self pick-up. Promotion is not valid with any other vouchers or promotions.

promos.title: Get your checks online
promos.description: Get electronic checks instead of paper ones. Just specify your email-address when sending the order.

promos.title: Daytime discount 5%
promos.description: Place an order from 12:00 to 14:00 and get a 5% discount. Promotion is not valid with any other vouchers or promotions.

promos.title: Save the planet
promos.description: 5% of your order cost is transferred to the Environmental protection fund.
